message.content:
{"id": "4974", "title": "Set classpath / output location should be one operation", 
"description": "The bug report is missing a description.", 
"OB": "The bug report does not provide any observed behavior.", 
"EB": "The bug report states that setting the classpath and output location should be offered as one operation, and suggests that the error message should be improved.",
"SR": "To reproduce the issue: \n1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. \n2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location."}
